mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0) AS TODAY_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '41') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TODAY_IST_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '42') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TODAY_BS_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '43') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TODAY_AS_CNT , NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0) AS TOMMR_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '41') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TOMMR_IST_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '42') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TOMMR_BS_CNT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN (T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' OR SUBSTR(T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,2) = '43') AND T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TOMMR_AS_CNT FROM (SELECT '1' AS AB_DV_CD , Z1.CNTR_NO , Z1.CNTR_SN , Z1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , Z1.VST_CNFMDT , Z1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , Z1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , Z1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ Z1 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ Z2 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ ON Z1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = Z2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE Z1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z1.ICHR_OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} /*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604', 'W0301' 일때*/
AND Z1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO IN (SELECT A.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS A JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL B ON A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO WHERE A.OG_ID = #{session.ogId} /*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604' 일때*/
AND B.RSB_DV_CD IN ('W0601', 'W0602', 'W0603', 'W0604')
/*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0301' 일때*/
AND B.RSB_DV_CD IN ('W0301', 'W0302')
AND B.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')
/*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604', 'W0301' 아닐때*/
AND Z1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND Z1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10', '20') AND (Z1.WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL OR Z1.WK_EXCN_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS AB_DV_CD , Z3.CNTR_NO , Z3.CNTR_SN , Z3.CST_SV_ASN_NO , Z3.VST_CNFMDT , Z3.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , SUBSTR(Z3.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD,1,1) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , Z3.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ Z3 /*고객서비스BS배정내역*/ JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ Z4 /*고객서비스BS대상내역*/ ON Z3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = Z4.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE Z3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} /*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604', 'W0301' 일때*/
AND Z3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO IN (SELECT A.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS A JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL B ON A.OG_TP_CD = B.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = B.PRTNR_NO WHERE A.OG_ID = #{session.ogId} /*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604' 일때*/
AND B.RSB_DV_CD IN ('W0601', 'W0602', 'W0603', 'W0604')
/*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0301' 일때*/
AND B.RSB_DV_CD IN ('W0301', 'W0302')
AND B.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')
/*세션 rsbCd 직책코드가 'W0603', 'W0604', 'W0301' 아닐때*/
AND Z3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND Z3.ASN_OJ_YM IN (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM'), TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 1), 'YYYYMM')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL TT1 JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ TT2 ON TT2.CNTR_NO = TT1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND TT2.CNTR_SN = TT1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN WHERE TT1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = Z3.CNTR_NO AND TT1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = Z3.CNTR_SN AND SUBSTR(TT2.VST_CNFMDT, 1, 6) = SUBSTR(Z3.VST_CNFMDT, 1, 6) AND TT1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD IN ('214', '216') /*모종결합*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TT1.VL_STRT_DTM AND TT1.VL_END_DTM AND TT1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TT2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')
) T1 LEFT JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T3 /*고객서비스작업결과내역*/ ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T3.CST_SV_ASN_NO JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T4 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 /*상품기본*/ ON T4.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 /*계약기본*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C2 /*계약주소관계*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = C2.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = C2.DTL_CNTR_SN AND C2.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*1:계약주소, 2:배달주소, 3:설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C2.VL_STRT_DTM AND C2.VL_END_DTM JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C3 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON C2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_DTL A1 /*고객상세*/ ON C3.CNTR_CST_NO = A1.CST_NO JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS G1 ON C3.ADR_ID = G1.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T10 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T10.PD_CD = P1.PD_CD AND T10.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T5 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN /*웰스팜.모종 관련 조건*/ WHERE (CASE WHEN (T1.AB_DV_CD = '1' AND T10.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11' AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '11%') THEN '2' ELSE '1' END) = '1' /*배정일자 오늘/내일*/ AND T1.VST_CNFMDT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1, 'YYYYMMDD')
